Validate NocoDB user e-mail

Source: R/nocodb.gen.R
validate_user_email.Rd

Validates a user's e-mail address on a NocoDB server via its POST /api/v1/auth/email/validate/{verification_token} API endpoint.

Usage

validate_user_email(
  verification_token,
  origin = pal::pkg_config_val("origin"),
  quiet = FALSE
)

Arguments

verification_token

User's e-mail verification token.

origin

NocoDB server origin. A character scalar.

quiet

Whether or not to suppress printing status output from internal processing.

Value

NULL, invisibly.

Details

You can use update_user() to get a tibble containing a user's email_verification_token.

See also

Other functions to manage NocoDB users: add_user(), base_users(), delete_base_user(), delete_user(), invite_base_user(), invite_user(), resend_base_user_invitation(), sign_up_user(), update_base_user(), update_user(), user_id(), users(), whoami()
